naslov: VILA SA BAZENOM, 4 SPAVAĆE, 2000 m2 OKUĆNICE, MINI GOLF, ŠTOKOVCI (prodaja)
Mogućnost zamjene: Nije moguća zamjena za drugu nekretninu
opis: NOVO U PONUDI! Nudimo  kvalitetnu vilu sa bazenom i mini golf igralištem na mirnoj lokaciji u prirodi.. Veličina zemljišta: 2000m2, ograđeno novo zidanim suhozidom visine od 1m do 2m. Sa lijeve strane nemam susjede, sa donje strane je šuma-neurbanizirani teren), a sa gornje strane je cesta,šljunak širine 6m. U cijelom objektu je previđen sustav centralnog grijanja. Izolacija na objektu je 10cm grafitnog stiropora, te trostruka PVC stolarija sa Low-e staklom ispunjena plinom. Podrum: multifunkcionalni prostor , fitness kao i druge sportske aktivnosti, kotlovnica PRIZEMLJE: 1. Spavaća soba sa vlastitim predprostorom i kupatilom (Tuš kada, bide, WC školjka, umivaonik), opremljena vlastitim klima uređajem,SAT/ TV-om, sefom; cca 26m2 - Dnevni prostor sa kuhinjom i blagavaonom- cca 55m2, klima uređaj, SAT/TV - predprostor za perilicu i sušilicu rublja - kupatilo za goste (Tuš kada, WC školjka, umivaonik) - izlaz na natkrivenu terasu od 36m2 sa pogledom na bazen i kamin PRVI KAT: 2. Spavaća soba sa vlastitim predprostorom i kupatilom (Tuš kada, bide, WC školjka, umivaonik), opremljena vlastitim klima uređajem,SAT/ TV-om, cca 22m2 3. Spavaća soba sa vlastitim predprostorom i kupatilom (Tuš kada, bide, WC školjka, umivaonik), opremljena vlastitim klima uređajem,SAT/ TV-om, cca 26m2 4. Spavaća soba sa vlastitim predprostorom i kupatilom (kada, bide, WC školjka, umivaonik), opremljena vlastitim klima uređajem,SAT/ TV-om, cca 25m2 – ova soba ima i izlaz na balkon od 7m2 sa pogledom na bazen i na more u daljini. -Internet u objektu, senzori za dim se nalaze u svim sobama, dnevnome boravku te podrumu. Objekt ima alarmni sustav kao i predviđen video nadzor izvana. Mini golf igralište, odbojkaško igralište.. Bazen veličine: 36m2, terasa oko bazena je 100m2 - Natkriveni gril kamin sa stolom za sjedenje , veličina cca 20m2. - Natkriveni parking za dva automobila, te dodatan parking za još dva vozila, ukupna površina parkinga cca 100m2 - dječje multifunkcionalno igralište  sastoji se od ljuljačke, tobogana, penjalice i još ponekoga sadržaja. UPORABNA DOZVOLA, 1/1 ! ENGLISH We offer a quality villa with a swimming pool and a mini golf course in a quiet location in nature. Land size: 2000m2, fenced with a newly built dry wall 1m to 2m high. I have no neighbors on the left side, on the lower side is a forest-non-urbanized terrain), and on the upper side is a road, gravel 6m wide. A central heating system has been overlooked throughout the building. The insulation on the building is 10 cm graphite styrofoam, and triple PVC carpentry with Low-e glass filled with gas. Basement: multifunctional space, fitness as well as other sports activities, boiler room GROUND FLOOR: 1st bedroom with its own hall and bathroom (shower, bidet, toilet bowl, sink), equipped with its own air conditioning, SAT/TV, safe; approx. 26m2 - Living room with kitchen and dining room - approx. 55m2, air conditioning, SAT/TV - vestibule for washing machine and tumble dryer - guest bathroom (shower, toilet bowl, sink) - exit to a covered terrace of 36m2 with a view of the pool and a fireplace. FIRST FLOOR: 2nd bedroom with its own hall and bathroom (shower, bidet, toilet bowl, sink), equipped with its own air conditioning, SAT/TV, approx. 22m2 3rd bedroom with its own hall and bathroom (shower, bidet, toilet bowl, sink), equipped with its own air conditioning, SAT/ TV, approx. 26m2 4. Bedroom with its own hall and bathroom (bathtub, bidet, toilet bowl, sink), equipped with its own air conditioning, SAT/ TV- om, approx. 25m2 - this room also has access to a 7m2 balcony with a view of the pool and the sea in the distance. Internet in the building, smoke sensors are in all rooms, living room and basement. The facility has an alarm system as well as video surveillance from the outside. Mini golf course, volleyball court.. Pool size: 36m2, terrace around the pool is 100m2 - Covered grill fireplace with table for sitting, size approx. 20m2. - Covered parking for two cars, and additional parking for two more vehicles, total parking area approx. 100m2 - children's multifunctional playground consists of a swing, a slide, a climbing frame and some other content.
